Fits well, doesn’t fall off, looks just like photo.
This fit was loose, the Material felt very scratchy and was uncomfortable. How ever it works for a one night shirt and looks good still. Was not impressed by the overall quality.
this top is so adorable and makes my skin pop. took a little bit to arrive, but otherwise i love this top !!
The shirt is so cute and fits very well. I definitely recommend. The stripes and the color just make the shirt.
It is very brightly colored but it is also very thin. Comfy material and very stretchy.
It was so thin it felt like the first layer of a swimsuit, you could see everything through it and it kept falling down. Immediately returned.

it fits perfectly fine, but it’s a bit see through. it’s able to deal with but i wouldn’t recommend

The material feels great against your skin, and I wore it all night without a bra. I had no trouble with it staying up, I only had to readjust/lift it 2-3 times throughout the night. I thought it looked exactly like the picture.  5’1” 125lbs 34” bust - 26.5” waist
You get what you pay for! You can tell it’s a cheap material but it still reaches the aesthetic I was going for!

The item I received was just a printed copy of the original item it still fit well I tend to size down for a slim fit I’m typically a medium but I did order a small. I was just expecting it to be double lined but it wasn’t it’s still cute I am still keeping because of the price
Cute but not the same as pictured

Love the colors. It’s light comfortable fabric that’s super stretchy. I’m 5’10 155 pounds with A cups and got a small it’s fits perfect. Doesn’t completely look like the photo but still happy with it!
if u don’t have smaller boobs don’t buy this, the shirt is mad cute but has the smallest indents for your boobs, if you’re larger than the indent then it looks a little silly imo.
